segments.text: Hey Mike . What are you doing tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Work is kicking my ass . I'm so stressed . Let's go grab a drink .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm always up for a drink . To tell you the truth , it's been quite stressful here too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I say we get drunk tonight . I don't want to think about all this stuff .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But we have to work tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We won't stay out too late . I just need to forget about work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hear ya . Let's do it .
segments.speaker: S2
